name: Shaft Specialist
entries: You have learned the secrets of how to wield a polearm with unrivaled grace and precision.

items: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
While you are holding a quarterstaff, spear, glaive, halberd, or pike with two hands, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.
A quarterstaff, spear, glaive, halberd, or pike has the finesse property when you wield it.
